title: YIP-5实施方案投票 YIP-5 implementation
body:
YIP-5提案（5%利润用作循环挖矿）之前已经投票通过，其可选实施方案现已经过充分讨论，根据方案讨论结果，选择支持率前3名为最终投票选项。

方案1：5% 的利润全部用于 YFII 或者 iYFII/YFII LP 的激励；（讨论支持率为64.2%）
方案2：5% 中的大部分用于 YFII 相关激励，少部分用于 iToken 的激励；（讨论支持率为7.6%）
方案3：5% 中的大部分用于 iToken 的激励，少部分用于 YFII 相关的激励；（讨论支持率为13.2%）

YIP-5提案实施方案讨论贴及结果统计：
https://gov.dfi.money/t/topic/680 



The YIP-5 proposal (5% of profits to be used for circular mining) has been adopted by voting before, and its optional solutions has been fully discussed, with the top 3 supporters being chosen as the final voting option based on the statistical results of the implementation discussion.

Option 1: 5% of the profits are entirely used for YFII or iYFII/YFII LP incentives; (discussion support rate is 64.2%)
Option 2: Most of the 5% goes to YFII-related incentives and a small portion to iToken incentives; (discussion support rate is  7.6%)
Option 3: Most of the 5% is used for iToken incentives and a small portion for YFII-related incentives; (discussion support rate is 13.2%)

YIP-5 Proposal Implementation Discussion Post and statistical results: https://gov.dfi.money/t/topic/680
choices: 5% 的利润全部用于 YFII 或者 iYFII/YFII LP 的激励 5% of the profits are entirely used for YFII or iYFII/YFII LP incentives
5% 中的大部分用于 YFII 相关激励，少部分用于 iToken 的激励 Most of the 5% goes to YFII-related incentives and a small portion to iToken incentives
5% 中的大部分用于 iToken 的激励，少部分用于 YFII 相关的激励 Most of the 5% is used for iToken incentives and a small portion for YFII-related incentives
